00060     virtual inline EORScriptDecoderScriptType ScriptTypeOf(UInt_t* record) 
00061       { return ((EORScriptDecoderScriptType) (record[kScriptTypeAndID] >> 28)); }
00062     virtual inline UShort_t ScriptObjectIDOf(UInt_t* record) 
00063       { return (record[kScriptTypeAndID] & 0xF); } 
00064     virtual inline UInt_t UnixTimeOf(UInt_t* record) 
00065       { return record[kUnixTime]; } 
00066     virtual inline UInt_t UserDataTagOf(UInt_t* record) 
00067       { return record[kDataTag]; }
00068     virtual inline UInt_t LengthOfXMLInBytesOf(UInt_t* record) 
00069       { return record[kXMLLength]; }
00070
